label: 愚管記
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
説明文: The diary of Konoe Michitsugu, who served as regent for the Northern Court, covering the years from 1356 to 1383. Though four years are missing and many entries are disappointingly brief, it is a valuable source for capital politics during the age of the two courts.
